verses.name: Luke 19:26
verses.text: For I say unto you, That unto every one which hath shall be given; and from him that hath not, even that he hath shall be taken away from him.

verses.name: Luke 19:27
verses.text: But those mine enemies, which would not that I should reign over them, bring hither, and slay them before me.

verses.name: Luke 19:28
verses.text: And when he had thus spoken, he went before, ascending up to Jerusalem.

verses.name: Luke 19:29
verses.text: And it came to pass, when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount called the mount of Olives, he sent two of his disciples,
